name: altruistically
content:

in a way that involves caring about others and helping them, despite not gaining anything by doing this: They deserve a lot of credit for their unpaid, altruistically motivated work. Those who contributed their time acted altruistically and not selfishly. See
altruistic
More examplesFewer examplesPolitical leaders will usually behave altruistically if the public strongly urges them to. There are individuals who will act altruistically on behalf of the community. When you act altruistically, the connection you form with people is one of respect.
